updates.content: TT Connect have advised that further impact is being seen. They are working on restoring services as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
Services in Beyerspark have been restored. TT Connect engineers are working on restoring further areas affected. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
